body_html:
The issue seems to be caused in:

tensorflow/tensorflow/python/framework/dtypes.py

Line 701 in 049dfd5

if key == type_value:

with crash happens in numpy. For example, the following will trigger a crash:

>>> import numpy as np
>>> np.dtype([("qint8", np.int8, 1)]) == "[,]"
Segmentation fault: 11

Added a PR #18481 to check the type of the type_value so that things like "[,]" is not compared.

Added a PR #18481 to check the type of the type_value so that things like "[,]" is not compared.
body:
The issue seems to be caused in:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/049dfd5e070cfa84c82eea71c6c746a70cba4a3f/tensorflow/python/framework/dtypes.py#L701

with crash happens in numpy. For example, the following will trigger a crash:
```
>>> import numpy as np
>>> np.dtype([("qint8", np.int8, 1)]) == "[,]"
Segmentation fault: 11
```

Added a PR #18481 to check the type of the `type_value` so that things like `"[,]"` is not compared.
